narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this first pre-license inspection for a class (cid:28)"A"(cid:29) license.
License fee can be sent to the following address:
USDA-APHIS-AC
2150 Centre Ave.

Conducting regulated activity without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
Exit interview conducted with Kelly Maxwell, ACI and the facility representative.
